      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Microwaves from mobile phones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellen von den beweglichen Telefonen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Micro-ondes des mobilophones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Microondas dos telefones móveis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Microonde dai telefoni mobili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικροκύματα από τα κινητά τηλέφωνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microondas de los teléfonos móviles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a mobile phone emitting microwaves weaker than those from a microwave oven.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microwave oven</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mobile phones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein bewegliches Telefon, 
welches die Mikrowellen ausstrahlt, die von einem Mikrowellenherd 
schwächer als die sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un mobilophone émettant
des micro-ondes plus faibles que ceux d'un four à micro-ondes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um telefone móvel que 
emite-se as microondas mais fracas do que aquelas de um forno de 
microonda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un telefono mobile che
emette le microonde più deboli di quelle da un forno a microonde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κινητό τηλέφωνο που 
εκπέμπει τα μικροκύματα πιό αδύνατα από εκείνοι από έναν 
φούρνο μικροκυμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un teléfono móvil que
emite las microondas más débiles que ésas de un horno de microonda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellenherd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bewegliche Telefone</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
